:mod:`rawls.scene.vector`
=========================

.. py:module:: rawls.scene.vector

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   3D vector representation

   .. attribute:: x

      {float} -- x axis value

   .. attribute:: y

      {float} -- y axis value

   .. attribute:: z

      {float} -- z axis value




---------------


.. py:class:: Vector3f(x, y, z)

   .. method:: __str__(self)


      Display Vector3f object representation

      :returns: {str} -- Vector3f information
